Emits a green light with balanced range and illumination.

Brain Scorcher and Miracle Machine Flickering
Lamps and flashlights flicker in the Brain Scorcher and Miracle Machine as long as they are active, giving a reason to bring/use glowsticks.
Chance to find glowsticks in stashes.
Chance to find glowsticks on dead bodies.
Key to hold to throw glowsticks.
